attributes.action: Real freedom of speech on television
attributes.additional_details: Anything that involves discussion usually scoffed at by the lefties (breakdown of society, sexism, immigration etc)   should be discussed just as openly and thoroughly as all other issues. We can't hide behind labels. We need to open our minds to what really needs to be discussed and accept we all have different views without being gagged by the PC brigade.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the broadcasting companies.
